short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Metrics Snapshot provides instant access to key domain metrics, like Domain Authority, Page Authority, Backlinks and Spam Score.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**What's New in Version 2.11:**
- Made the Refresh button smaller and added cache date info.
- Cached data is valid for 72 hours and refreshed automatically.
- Added data source attribution and version number in the tool.
- Minor UI improvements.

Check out the full version history in our support documentation!

SEO Metrics Snapshot is a powerful Chrome extension for quickly accessing Domain Authority (DA), Page Authority (PA), Backlink Insights, and Spam Score – perfect for SEO professionals and marketers.

SEO Metrics Snapshot: Unlock Instant Insights into Website Authority

Key Features:

	•	Instant DA Metrics: Easily access critical SEO metrics such as Domain Authority (DA), Page Authority (PA), MozTrust, Backlink Insights and Spam Score with a single click. Simply click the extension icon on any site to retrieve and display metrics like DA instantly, right on the badge.
	•	Badge Display for Quick Tracking: The DA score is prominently displayed on the extension badge for each unique URL, allowing seamless tracking as you navigate across sites. Cached metrics automatically appear on tabs with the same URL, ensuring instant access without repeated data requests.
	•	Efficient Data Caching: Metrics are cached for previously visited sites, enabling quick switching between tabs or revisiting URLs without reloading data. For up-to-date information, simply click the icon to refresh the metrics.
	•	Color-Coded Visual Indicators: The extension badge uses intuitive color coding—dark green for cached metrics and red for unavailable data—making it easy to interpret metrics at a glance.

How It Works:

	1.	Open any website in a new browser tab.
	2.	Click the SEO Metrics Snapshot icon in your Chrome toolbar to retrieve the site’s metrics.
	3.	View the DA score on the extension badge, with color-coded indicators for clarity.
	4.	Navigate between tabs with the same URL to see cached metrics, or click the icon again to refresh.

Who It’s For:

	•	Digital Marketers: Effortlessly evaluate website authority for outreach and strategy.
	•	SEO Professionals: Quickly assess link-building opportunities and competitive metrics.
	•	Content Creators & Website Owners: Monitor and analyze your website’s performance with ease.

Your Privacy Matters:

	•	Secure Data Handling: The extension fetches only the necessary metrics for the URLs you visit and does not store or share any personal information.

Enhance your workflow with SEO Metrics Snapshot, the ultimate Chrome extension for fast, reliable, and actionable SEO insights. Start assessing website authority like a pro today!
